first a little overview on the lx now
this is lexus's flagship suv and it

in 1996 as the

reliability and longevity the lx also

a 5.7 liter v8 that makes about 380

come at the expense of fuel economy this
thing gets 13 miles per gallon city and
18 miles per gallon highway which is
among the worst of any modern suv and
then there's the drawback of age now the

way back in 2008

b

space

that in this vehicle unlike in most
other full-size suvs the third row
doesn't fold flat instead you have to
